bio:
This man is one of a few guards who patrol the Gautierre manor.
The owner of the manor is a Breton man named Simund Gautierre, a highborn member of Count Desilus Carvain's court at Castle Bruma. This manor is a remote location northeast of the city of Bruma.
This particular guard is a Redguard man who sports a ponytail on an otherwise shaved head. He is currently stationed within the manor itself, on the first floor. He wears an iron cuirass, gauntlets, boots, and a shield. He is armed with an iron club. He will attack any intruders on sight.
name: Gautierre Manor Guard
